alert.note: Alert for Grand and Battlement Mesas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 3:10PM MDT until March 25 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO 6 AM MDT SATURDAY ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 8000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas. * WHEN...From noon Friday to 6 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could reduce visibility at times. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
